metadata.title: CVE-2024-0072 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - medium
metadata.description: NVIDIA CUDA toolkit for all platforms contains a vulnerability in cuobjdumpand nvdisasm where an attacker may cause a crash by tricking a user intoreading a malformed ELF file. A successful exploit of this vulnerabilitymay lead to a partial denial of service.

criterions.comment: nvidia-cuda-toolkit package in mantic is affected and may need fixing.
